content:
Succession is an addictive show, and it's great that you want to stay current!

As of our conversation, the latest season of Succession is Season 3, and the latest episode is Episode 9, titled "All the Bells Say." The season finale aired on December 12, 2021.

To catch up, you've got two episodes to go: Episode 8, "Chiantishire," and Episode 9, "All the Bells Say." Once you're all caught up, you can enjoy the latest developments in the Roy family's drama-filled lives.

Remember, Succession is a show that rewards close attention, so take your time, and savor the complex characters, clever writing, and excellent performances. Good luck, and happy bingeing!
